text: Kayleigh, a lot of nonsense has been said by many people in America & elsewhere unfamiliar with #Chloroquine (CQ), which I took from the age of 4 until I was 20 years old before moving to UK. It is perfectly safe if taken as prescribed. #CQ has been safe to use for over 70 yrs! https://t.co/jTHUiCPxkA
